channel.title: Location reset after logging out
channel.description:
Every time anybody logs out of my server, they end up re-spawning at the place you start instead of where they where when they logged out, iv had a look in most of the files that control the logging out and in process but i cant seem to find anything, can someone tell me what i may have missed, thanks.
---- anybody?
